page.title: 18Attitudes
page.content: At this point in time Magor is experiencing radical changes, consequently,the villagers opinions on how there changes take place is an important factor. As new estates appear,local people take an interest in how the development can be blended into the existing village,in a manner that does not destroy its character. Therefore the villagers concern for their environment has been heightened ,and has influenced the developers. This co-operation has proved successful.The village centre has been deemed an area of historic interest and has a preservation order covering it.New estates have been carefully landscaped,with trees planted to cut down noise and to split up large estates into smaller units.
